reviews.review_msg: The professor's unclear expectations led to poor grading. Despite completing practice assignments by the April 11 deadline as outlined, she failed to mark them, citing a need for deeper understanding. This contradicts her stated criteria and raises fairness concerns.

She keeps talking in French. She wouldn't explain anything to you in English. She would repeat sentences hoping at least one student would understand, and then one of them would end up using Google translator.

This professor was the worst french professor anyone could have. 

She only taught french to students who already knew French, those were the students who took this course only to boost their GPA and not to learn anything. It was literally just 3 students in the class. The rest of the students would sit cluelessly.
